mapper.update: update `giftpage` set version = version+1, giftName = #{giftName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, giftDetails = #{giftDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, giftTotal = #{giftTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, giftNum = #{giftNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, giftType_id= #{giftType.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, codeType_id= #{codeType.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, game_id= #{gameType.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version=#{version}
mapper.select: select gp.id,gp.version,gp.giftName,gp.giftTotal,gp.giftDetails,gp.giftNum, gt.id as gt_id,gt.typeName as gt_typeName, ga.id as ga_id,ga.gameName as ga_gameName, ct.id as ct_id,ct.typeName as ct_typeName from giftpage gp JOIN gifttype gt ON gp.giftType_id = gt.id left join game ga ON gp.game_id =ga.id left join codetype ct on gp.codeType_id=ct.id where ga.id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
